column2: Register functional images to a standard MNI152 template. This option must be enabled if you wish to calculate any derivatives.
column3: A list where ‘1’ represents ‘yes’ and ‘0’ represents ‘no’ (e.g., ‘[1]’).

column2: The resolution (in mm) to which functional images are transformed during registration.
Standard FSL Skull Stripped Template. Used as a reference image for functional registration.
Standard FSL Template with skull. Used as a reference image for functional registration.
Matrix containing all 1’s. Used as an identity matrix during registration. It is not necessary to change this path unless you intend to use non-standard MNI registration.
The resolutions to resample the normalized functional timeseries to.
